devdoc.author: Keeymon, DavidRochus

AcceptanceReceived(address,uint256,uint2.details: Triggered when an acceptance is received

AcknowledgeSent(address,uint256,uint256).details: Triggered when an acknowledge has to be sent

ClosedProposal(uint256).details: Triggered when a proposal is closed

ConfirmationSent(uint256,uint256,address.details: Triggered when a confirmation has to be sent

LowBalanceReceived(address,string).details: Triggered when a lowBalance is received

OfferSent(uint256,address,uint256,uint8,.details: Triggered when an offer has to be sent

ProductCreated(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Triggered when a product is created

ProposalAdded(uint256,uint8,uint256,uint.details: Triggered when a proposal is added

TopUpReceived(address,uint256,uint256).details: Triggered when a topUp is received

addProposal(uint8,uint256,uint256,string.details: Add a proposal with the following information: minimum scoring `_minScoring`, amount `_capital` + `_interest`, description `_description`

params._capital: Capital part of the proposal amount
params._interest: Interest part of the proposal amount
params._minScoring: The minimum score needed by customer to receive this proposal

closedProposal(uint256).details: Close the proposal with the ID `_id`

params._id: ID of the proposal to close

createProduct(address,uint256,uint256,ui.details: Create a product with the following information: a customer (identified with `_phoneHash`), an offer ID `_idOffer`, a proposal ID `_idProposal` and a timestamp `_acceptanceTimestamp`

params._phoneHash: The address that identifies to the customer

getIndexProposalOffer(uint256,uint256).details: Return the ID proposal in offer

params._id: The ID of the array proposal in an offer

getOfferProposals(uint8).details: Return the proposals that correspond to the given scoring `_scoring`

getOfferSize(address).details: Get the size of the Offers of a customer (identified with `_phoneHash`)

params._phoneHash: The address that identifies to the customer

getOffersSize().details: Get the size of all the offers

getSizeProposalOffer(uint256).details: Return the number of proposal in an offer

lowBalanceOffering(address,string,uint8).details: Manage lowBalance (with reference `_ref`) of a customer (identified with `_phoneHash`) and generate an offer based on the score `_score`

params._phoneHash: The address that identifies to the customer

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

trimOfferProposals(uint256[],uint8).details: Return a proposals based on table `_offerProposals` with only the first `_offerProposalsCount` proposals

params._offerProposalsCount: Number of proposals to retrieve in the initial table

offerList.details: Mapping to access offers related to a phoneHash

devdoc.title: This Smart Contract is responsible to generate the offers for customers.

getIndexProposalOffer(uint256,uint256).notice: Get the ID proposal in offer

getOfferProposals(uint8).notice: Get the proposals corresponding to the scoring

getOfferSize(address).notice: Get the size of the Offers of a customer

getOffersSize().notice: Get the size of all the offers

getSizeProposalOffer(uint256).notice: Number of proposal in an offer

lowBalanceOffering(address,string,uint8).notice: Manage the "low balances" received and generate an offer

trimOfferProposals(uint256[],uint8).notice: Create a trimmed table of the proposals

userdoc.notice: Manage all aspects related to offering (proposals, customers and products management)
